title: Data- & Aria- Attribute Support Added to XHP
description: Last night I added data- and aria- attribute support into XHP. I baked it into :x:composable-element directly instead of relying on previous methods which only added it to :xhp:html-element. I did this for a few reasons. First, I didn’t like the idea of getAttribute() and setAttribute() not being final within :x:primitive. Secondly, if you want to build a UI framework on top of :x:element that forwards attributes, you’d need to un-final getAttribute() and setAttribute() in :x:element too, and duplicate all the logic in :xhp:html-element into your UI framework.
